```{r yoga}

setwd("/Users/nickorangio/Main Directory/Personal Projects/R Data Viz")

yoga_data = read.csv('edited_csv', header = TRUE)

library("ggplot2")

#kcal by duration
ggplot(yoga_data, aes(x=Duration, y=Total.Energy.kcal)) +      geom_point(aes(size=Max.Heart.Rate, color=Month)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 7, angle = 40, vjust = 0.7)) +
  ylab("Total kcal burned")

#kcal by date
ggplot(yoga_data, aes(x=Start, y=Total.Energy.kcal)) +      geom_point(aes(size=Max.Heart.Rate, color=Month)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 7, angle = 40, vjust = 0.5)) +
  ylab("Total kcal burned")

```
